si.title: බ්රහස්පතිගේ ලේකම්
body_lines: අල්ලස් කොමිෂන් සභාවේ පනත අතරතුර ඔහු අත්අඩංගුවට ගත් බව වාර්තා වේ.. රීල්

en.title: Jupiter's secretary arrested
body_lines: It is reported that he was arrested during the act of the Bribery Commission.. Remble

summary_lines: Jupiter's secretary was arrested while allegedly involved in bribery activities with the Bribery Commission.
